actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to insure the right of States to establish and prescribe the powers of their local educational agencies.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that each State shall have the right to establish and prescribe the powers of their local educational agencies.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to insure the right of States to establish and prescribe the powers of their local educational agencies.
